Phrase en Anglais: You can set this as your current home point.
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez définir ceci comme votre point de retour actuel.

Phrase en Anglais: Once you set a home point, you will return there whenever you are incapacitated.
Phrase en Français: Une fois que vous avez défini un point de retour, vous y retournerez chaque fois que vous serez incapacités.

Phrase en Anglais: Set this as current home point?
Phrase en Français: Définir ceci comme point de retour actuel ?

Phrase en Anglais: A home point can be set as a spot for you to return to Vana'diel when you have been knocked out. You can also use a home point to teleport to other home points.
Phrase en Français: Un point de retour peut être défini comme un endroit où vous reviendrez à Vana'diel lorsque vous serez mis K.O. Vous pouvez également utiliser un point de retour pour vous téléporter vers d'autres points de retour.${prompt}
Voyager vers un autre point de retour.

Phrase en Anglais: Set this as your home point.
Phrase en Français: Définir ceci comme votre point de retour.

Phrase en Anglais: You have registered a new home point!
Phrase en Français: Vous avez enregistré un nouveau point de retour !

Phrase en Anglais: You are now able to teleport here from any other home point.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez désormais vous téléporter ici depuis n'importe quel autre point de retour.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You may teleport from here to any other home point you have registered.
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez vous téléporter d'ici vers n'importe quel autre point de retour que vous avez enregistré.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You have not yet registered any other home points, and thus are unable to teleport.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous n'avez encore enregistré aucun autre point de retour, donc vous ne pouvez pas vous téléporter.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: It costs ${number: 3} gil to teleport to Home Point #${number: 2} in ${zone: 1[2]}.
Phrase en Français: Cela coûte ${number: 3} gil pour se téléporter au Point de retour #${number: 2} dans ${zone: 1[2]}.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: There is no fee for teleporting to Home Point #${number: 2} in ${zone: 1[2]}.
Phrase en Français: Il n’y a pas de frais pour se téléporter au Point de retour #${number: 2} dans ${zone: 1[2]}.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: A Rise of the Zilart area.
Phrase en Français: Une zone de Rise of the Zilart.
Une zone de Chains of Promathia.

Phrase en Anglais: A Treasures of Aht Urhgan area.
Phrase en Français: Une zone de Treasures of Aht Urhgan.

Phrase en Anglais: A Wings of the Goddess area.
Phrase en Français: Une zone de Wings of the Goddess.
Une zone de Seekers of Adoulin.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You may change the method of selecting the area of your desired home point to teleport to.
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez changer la méthode de sélection de la zone de votre point de retour souhaité pour vous téléporter.

Phrase en Anglais: Home Point #${number: 2} in ${zone: 1[2]} has been ${choice: 33}[registered to/removed from] your list of favorite locations.
Phrase en Français: Le Point de retour #${number: 2} dans ${zone: 1[2]} a été ${choice: 33}[enregistré sur/supprimé de] votre liste d’emplacements favoris.

Phrase en Anglais: Your list of favorite locations is full. You must delete an existing entry in order to register a new one.
Phrase en Français: Votre liste d'emplacements favoris est pleine. Vous devez supprimer une entrée existante pour en enregistrer une nouvelle.

Phrase en Anglais: Ballista is an exercise once used by the San d'Orian armies to train the Royal Knights in the art of the siege. The word “ballista” means “to throw a stone,” and the game has been a part of Vana'dielian military history for centuries.${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Ballista is an exercise once used by the San d'Orian armies to train the Royal Knights in the art of the siege. The word “ballista” means “to throw a stone,” and the game has been a part of Vana'dielian military history for centuries.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Ballista is played by two teams over a number of hours (Vana'diel time). The team with the most points at the end of the match is the victor.${prompt}

Players from both teams must search for ${color: 5}Petras${color: 1} that a ${color: 5}Herald${color: 1} has buried in various locations across the battlefield. The players must then take these stones and throw them into targets known as ${color: 5}Rooks${color: 1}.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Ballista is played by two teams over a number of hours (Vana'diel time). The team with the most points at the end of the match is the victor.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: These ${color: 5}Rooks${color: 1} can appear in various locations around the battlefield, and both teams are allowed to throw their ${color: 5}Petras${color: 1} into them.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Players from both teams must search for ${color: 5}Petras${color: 1} that a ${color: 5}Herald${color: 1} has buried in various locations across the battlefield. The players must then take these stones and throw them into targets known as ${color: 5}Rooks${color: 1}.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Finally, a player's strength is adjusted depending on his or her level. It is felt that this ultimately allows for a more balanced battle.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: These ${color: 5}Rooks${color: 1} can appear in various locations around the battlefield, and both teams are allowed to throw their ${color: 5}Petras${color: 1} into them.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: ${color: 5}Petras${color: 1} can be buried anywhere. Once a player believes he or she has found one, the ${color: 5}Quarry${color: 1} (/quarry) command should be used to dig up the area at his or her feet.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Finally, a player's strength is adjusted depending on his or her level. It is felt that this ultimately allows for a more balanced battle.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Sometimes a player may find items other than ${color: 5}Petras${color: 1}, such as potions. These ${color: 5}temporary items${color: 1} can only be used during the current match (or Best of Three series).${prompt}
Phrase en Français: ${color: 5}Petras${color: 1} can be buried anywhere. Once a player believes he or she has found one, the ${color: 5}Quarry${color: 1} (/quarry) command should be used to dig up the area at his or her feet.${prompt}

As one can see, careful planning and impeccable timing are the keys to victory.${prompt}

Phrase en Français: As one can see, careful planning and impeccable timing are the keys to victory.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The locations of the ${color: 5}Rooks${color: 1} are constantly changing. This makes it quite difficult to find the targets by just randomly walking about the area.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: However, remember that once a player has obtained a ${color: 5}Petra${color: 1}, he or she will be unable to use the ${color: 5}Sprint${color: 1} command. In its place, though, one may use the ${color: 5}Scout${color: 1} command.${prompt}

Requirements for participating in an E.F. are simple. Your party must consist of ${number: 5} members. Each member must be from this country, rank 3 or higher, and have reached a sufficient level.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Welcome back from the expedition. Our nation was successful in its campaign. Let me give you your reward.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Actuellement, nous sommes classés premiers dans la conquête de Vana'diel, mais cela ne doit pas être pris pour acquis. Nous devons continuer notre lutte pour rester au sommet.${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Some sneaky scoundrels have swiped the armor we brought in for the Feast of Swords...again, kupo!${prompt}

As you probably already know, the villains wearing the armor are invulnerable to normal weapons! And as if that wasn't enough, they're surrounded by a powerful aura that prevents them from being attacked at all, kupo!${prompt}
Our top moogle researchers have created weapons that can injure these armor-thieving hooligans--the wondrous ${item-singular: 0[2]} and the marvelous ${item-singular: 1[2]}, kupo!${prompt}
The nomad moogles have also developed a magic that will annul that anti-attack aura, so be sure to pay them a visit while wearing the weapon before you engage the enemy, kupo.${prompt}
But be warned--this magic has the side effect of preventing you from attacking any other monster for three whole Vana'dielian days, kupo!${prompt}
This time we want to make sure that the wretched thieves have a hard time coming back, kupo!${prompt}
You see, even if you take one of them down, the power of the armor will slowly restore his health, and before you know it, the scoundrel will be back up to full health!${prompt}

Phrase en Français: “Elite training” is a section of the Field Manual which caters to dauntless adventurers who wish to engage in a more grueling test of their mettle.${prompt}
To participate in elite training regimes, you must acquire chapter transcripts, for which tabs are required.${prompt}
Trading ${item-plural: 35[2]}, gil, or a piece of equipment at designated locations (while in possession of a chapter transcript) will trigger the commencement of your training.${prompt}
Traded items will not be returned to you. You will, however, be furnished with rewards of correlating value upon the successful completion of each elite training regime.${prompt}
Even within elite training, there are regimes of varying difficulty. The trade limit for each succeeding chapter will be greater than the last, and the training objective more challenging.
For safety reasons, all participants are recommended to be well prepared.${prompt}

Lastly, we at the A.M.A.N. recognize the importance of rest and recuperation as part of a healthy adventuring lifestyle. Therefore, a mandatory cool-down period will be imposed upon all adventurers following the completion of an elite training regime. Until this time has elapsed, you will be unable to undertake further training, even if a chapter transcript is in your possession.${prompt}
You cannot undertake a training regime while a hunt is active.${prompt}

Phrase en Français: The Voidwatch is a fellowship of men and women come together to defend the world from extradimensional invaders called “Voidwalkers.” Driven only by an insatiable appetite for destruction, these fell horrors roam the space between dimensions, ever seeking to enter and plunge Vana'diel into chaos.${prompt}
Faced with the risk of mass invasion, Voidwatch leaders devised a strategy wherein potential threats are preemptively neutralized.
This act was made possible through the discovery of voidstones, magicked objects capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible to be summarily dispatched.${prompt}
Such efforts to stem the rise of Voidwalkers, collectively dubbed “Voidwatch Operations,” or “Ops” for short, take place in the vicinity of planar rifts--weak points in the fabric of space.${prompt}

A single person may initiate a Voidwatch operation, at which time “Voidwatcher” status will be bestowed upon all qualifying party and alliance members, allowing them to commence battle with the target Voidwalker.${prompt}

Voidwatch Ops are subject to a time limit. Exceed this limit and Voidwatcher status will be revoked for all involved, bringing the confrontation to an end. Individuals straying too far from the site of battle, too, will find themselves relieved of the status.${prompt}
Know also that those who take on the burden of the Voidwatcher become temporarily isolated and unable to receive aid from the outside world.
Such is the arduous nature of transdimensional encounters.${prompt}
Initiating a Voidwatch operation requires a voidstone, as well as a stratum abyssite attuned to a particular planar rift.${prompt}
Only one person needs to be in possession of these objects for all party and alliance members to participate.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The Voidwatch is a fellowship of men and women come together to defend the world from extradimensional invaders called “Voidwalkers.” Driven only by an insatiable appetite for destruction, these fell horrors roam the space between dimensions, ever seeking to enter and plunge Vana'diel into chaos.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: However, there exists a number of participation conditions that must be observed.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Faced with the risk of mass invasion, Voidwatch leaders devised a strategy wherein potential threats are preemptively neutralized.
Phrase en Français: When an operation commences, a single voidstone will be expended for all who possess it.

Phrase en Anglais: This act was made possible through the discovery of voidstones, magicked objects capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible to be summarily dispatched.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: These combatants will have the opportunity to improve their spoils by manipulating spectral alignment values during battle.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Such efforts to stem the rise of Voidwalkers, collectively dubbed “Voidwatch Operations,” or “Ops” for short, take place in the vicinity of planar rifts--weak points in the fabric of space.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Conversely, those not possessing their own voidstone will be limited in the spoils they can obtain.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: A single person may initiate a Voidwatch operation, at which time “Voidwatcher” status will be bestowed upon all qualifying party and alliance members, allowing them to commence battle with the target Voidwalker.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: The “voidstone” is a magicked object which, when coupled with stratum abyssite, is capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Voidwatch Ops are subject to a time limit. Exceed this limit and Voidwatcher status will be revoked for all involved, bringing the confrontation to an end. Individuals straying too far from the site of battle, too, will find themselves relieved of the status.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Only a single combatant need possess a voidstone to allow all party and alliance members to participate in a Voidwatch operation.

Phrase en Anglais: Know also that those who take on the burden of the Voidwatcher become temporarily isolated and unable to receive aid from the outside world.
Phrase en Français: Those without one, however, will find their spoils limited in both quantity and quality.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Such is the arduous nature of transdimensional encounters.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: As a single voidstone is automatically expended when the battle commences, it is recommended that you keep stock of your inventory.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Initiating a Voidwatch operation requires a voidstone, as well as a stratum abyssite attuned to a particular planar rift.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Those wishing to obtain the stones should speak to a Voidwatch officer, who is charged with issuing a set quantity at fixed intervals.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Only one person needs to be in possession of these objects for all party and alliance members to participate.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Stratum abyssite are dynamic stones capable of evolution. By absorbing the energies emitted by felled Voidwalkers, they become attuned with other planar rifts.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: However, there exists a number of participation conditions that must be observed.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: After defeating your quarry, present your stone to an atmacite refiner--specialists in the study of otherworld geology--to have its properties determined.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: When an operation commences, a single voidstone will be expended for all who possess it.
Phrase en Français: Stratum abyssite growth occurs independently of voidstones, and the latter is not required to trigger development.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: These combatants will have the opportunity to improve their spoils by manipulating spectral alignment values during battle.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Each dimension is composed of its own existential spectrum to which objects of that world are aligned. The act of rendering a Voidwalker visible is essentially an act of aligning oneself to its existential spectrum.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Conversely, those not possessing their own voidstone will be limited in the spoils they can obtain.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: While Voidwatchers are able to, for all practical purposes, interact with such creatures, they in fact fall short of full alignment. Symptoms of this imperfect state can be observed in the limited quantity and quality of spoils normally yielded by Voidwalkers.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The “voidstone” is a magicked object which, when coupled with stratum abyssite, is capable of rendering Voidwalkers visible.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Compensating measures, however, exist which allow combatants to more closely attune themselves with their extradimensional foe. One such method involves the use of alignment-enhancing artifacts known as “ascent items.”${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Only a single combatant need possess a voidstone to allow all party and alliance members to participate in a Voidwatch operation.
Phrase en Français: Alignment values raised through ascent items will remain in place until such time as a riftworn pyxis is opened at the end of a successful operation.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Those without one, however, will find their spoils limited in both quantity and quality.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Those participating in Voidwatch Ops are recommended to plan ahead in order to make effective use of ascent items.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: As a single voidstone is automatically expended when the battle commences, it is recommended that you keep stock of your inventory.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Alignment values can also be raised in the midst of battle by striking at enemy weaknesses, causing their existential attunement to shift to your advantage.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Those wishing to obtain the stones should speak to a Voidwatch officer, who is charged with issuing a set quantity at fixed intervals.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Blows can be dealt with abilities such as weapon skills and magic spells, and your choice of weakness and the manner in which you strike it will determine which hue of the alignment spectrum is affected.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Stratum abyssite are dynamic stones capable of evolution. By absorbing the energies emitted by felled Voidwalkers, they become attuned with other planar rifts.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: The existential spectrum is comprised of five lights (blue, red, yellow, green, and white), each of which influences reward yield.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: After defeating your quarry, present your stone to an atmacite refiner--specialists in the study of otherworld geology--to have its properties determined.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: The precise workings of each light can be reviewed when examining your current alignment values.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Stratum abyssite growth occurs independently of voidstones, and the latter is not required to trigger development.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Upon the successful conclusion of battle, the alignment bonus as granted by ascent items and the exploitation of enemy weaknesses are combined to determine the spoils.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Each dimension is composed of its own existential spectrum to which objects of that world are aligned. The act of rendering a Voidwalker visible is essentially an act of aligning oneself to its existential spectrum.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Be forewarned: Voidwalkers are highly guileful beings and will not suffer the same weakness being struck twice. Combatants must be on constant watch for any changes that may occur during the course of battle.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: While Voidwatchers are able to, for all practical purposes, interact with such creatures, they in fact fall short of full alignment. Symptoms of this imperfect state can be observed in the limited quantity and quality of spoils normally yielded by Voidwalkers.${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Atmacite is resilient and will not be expended in the infusion process.${prompt}
